review.title: “Working with CDAC, Noida”
review.pros: Pros – Being in the government sector it provides the secure working environment which is good for learning. Its integration with the industry oriented courses make it easy to find a good number of trainees.
review.cons: Cons – A big issue is slow decision making and interference from the ministry. Not being able to properly deploy people is also an issue.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Balancing needs to be done to avoid Ministry's influence, and only then CDAC can get any project from industry in addition to only government sector as is the case now.
